metadata.description: Azure region where the resources will be deployed in
The fully qualified name of the application
Id of the user or app to assign application roles
Whether to use a custom SSL certificate or not. If set to true, the certificate must be provided in the path cert/certificate.pfx.
Whether to deploy the jump host or not
The username of the jump host admin user
The password of the jump host admin user
Whether to deploy a redis cache for the wordpress instance or not.
The image to use for the wordpress container. Default is kpantos/wordpress-alpine-php:latest
Enable usage and telemetry feedback to Microsoft.
It is not recommended that you use prefix by azure you should be using a suffix for your resources.
It is recommended that you specify a suffix for consistency. Please use only lowercase characters when possible.
Custom seed value for the unique string to be created -defaults to resourceGroup Id.
Max length of the uniqueness suffix to be added
Use dashes as separator where applicable
Create names using lowercase letters
A descriptive name for the resources to be created in Azure
This is the fqdn exposed by this wordpress instance. Note this must much the certificate
Naming principles implementation
The location where resources will be deployed
Whether to use a custom SSL certificate or not. If set to true, the certificate must be provided in the path cert/certificate.pfx.
Whether to deploy the jump host or not
The principal ID of the service principal that will be deploying the resources. If not specified, the current user will be used.
Whether to deploy a redis cache for the wordpress instance or not.
The wordpress container image to use.

parameters.accessPolicies: [if(not(empty(parameters('principalId'))), createObject('value', createArray(createObject('objectId', parameters('principalId'), 'tenantId', subscription().tenantId, 'permissions', createObject('secrets', createArray('get'))))), createObject('value', createArray()))]

metadata.description: Array of access policy configurations, schema ref: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/templates/microsoft.keyvault/vaults/accesspolicies?tabs=json#microsoftkeyvaultvaultsaccesspolicies-object
Secrets array with name/value pairs
Array of name/value pairs

input.id: [resourceId('Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/secrets', split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('keyVaultName'), parameters('secrets')[copyIndex()].name), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('keyVaultName'), parameters('secrets')[copyIndex()].name), '/')[1])]
input.name: [format('{0}/{1}', parameters('keyVaultName'), parameters('secrets')[copyIndex()].name)]
input.props: [reference(resourceId('Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/secrets', split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('keyVaultName'), parameters('secrets')[copyIndex()].name), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('keyVaultName'), parameters('secrets')[copyIndex()].name), '/')[1]), '2018-02-14')]

copy.input: [resourceId('Microsoft.Network/privateDnsZones/virtualNetworkLinks', split(format('{0}/{1}-link-{2}', parameters('privateDnsZoneName'), parameters('privateDnsZoneName'), range(0, length(parameters('vnetIds')))[copyIndex()]), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}-link-{2}', parameters('privateDnsZoneName'), parameters('privateDnsZoneName'), range(0, length(parameters('vnetIds')))[copyIndex()]), '/')[1])]

metadata.description: The FQDN of the Application Gateawy.Must match the TLS Certificate.

properties.sslCertificates: [if(not(empty(parameters('certificateKeyName'))), createArray(createObject('name', parameters('appGatewayFQDN'), 'properties', createObject('keyVaultSecretId', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/secrets', parameters('keyVaultName'), parameters('certificateKeyName')), '2022-07-01').secretUriWithVersion))), createArray())]
properties.frontendPorts: [if(not(empty(parameters('certificateKeyName'))), createArray(createObject('name', variables('resourceNames').frontendPort, 'properties', createObject('port', 443))), createArray(createObject('name', variables('resourceNames').frontendPort, 'properties', createObject('port', 80))))]
properties.httpListeners: [if(not(empty(parameters('certificateKeyName'))), createArray(createObject('name', variables('resourceNames').httpListener, 'properties', createObject('frontendIPConfiguration', createObject('id', resourceId('Microsoft.Network/applicationGateways/frontendIPConfigurations', parameters('name'), variables('resourceNames').frontendIpConfiguration)), 'frontendPort', createObject('id', resourceId('Microsoft.Network/applicationGateways/frontendPorts', parameters('name'), variables('resourceNames').frontendPort)), 'protocol', 'Https', 'sslCertificate', createObject('id', resourceId('Microsoft.Network/applicationGateways/sslCertificates', parameters('name'), parameters('appGatewayFQDN')))))), createArray(createObject('name', variables('resourceNames').httpListener, 'properties', createObject('frontendIPConfiguration', createObject('id', resourceId('Microsoft.Network/applicationGateways/frontendIPConfigurations', parameters('name'), variables('resourceNames').frontendIpConfiguration)), 'frontendPort', createObject('id', resourceId('Microsoft.Network/applicationGateways/frontendPorts', parameters('name'), variables('resourceNames').frontendPort)), 'protocol', 'Http'))))]
